label: Eligibility Criteria for Wegovy
header: Step 2: Verify Prescriber and Patient Documentation

items.text: Document Wegovy will be used with a reduced-calorie diet and increased physical activity for chronic weight management in adults.
items.validation: Stop and Ask Clinical Staff to Make a Referral. (This Does Not Require Documentation).

items.text: Documented baseline body mass index (BMI) â‰¥ 27 kg/m^2.

items.label: Document Wegovy will not be coadministered with other semaglutide-containing products or with any other GLP-1 receptor agonist.
